name: starter-2026
description: A custom WordPress theme built with ACF (Advanced Custom Fields) blocks.

scripts.build:css: npx postcss css/frontend.css -o assets/build/front-end.css && npx postcss css/editor.css -o assets/build/editor-gs.css
scripts.watch:css: npx postcss css/frontend.css -o assets/build/front-end.css --watch & npx postcss css/editor.css -o assets/build/editor-gs.css --watch
